text: Us ghadi ka ilm Allah hi ke paas hai, wahi baarish barsata hai, wahi jaanta hai ke maaon ke paithon mein kya parwarish paa raha hai, koi mutanaffis nahin jaanta ke kal woh kya kamayi karne wala hai aur na kisi shaks ko yeh khabar hai ke kis sar-zameen mein usko maut aani hai. Allah hi sabkuch jaanney wala aur bakhabar hai
